    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • completeWelcomeScreen

        protected void completeWelcomeScreen()
        Closes the activity and saves it as completed. A subsequent call to WelcomeScreenHelper.show() would not show this again, unless the key is changed.

      • cancelWelcomeScreen

        protected void cancelWelcomeScreen()
        Closes the activity, doesn't save as completed. A subsequent call to WelcomeScreenHelper.show() would show this again.

        public void onBackPressed()
